metadata.title: CVE-2022-28739 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
There is a buffer over-read in Ruby before 2.6.10, 2.7.x before 2.7.6, 3.xbefore 3.0.4, and 3.1.x before 3.1.2. It occurs in String-to-Floatconversion, including Kernel#Float and String#to_f.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28739` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.7
ruby2.7 - 2.7.0-5ubuntu1.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.7 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.0-5ubuntu1.7').
